title: A Special Soybean Helps Dairy Farms Save Money
summary: On a dairy farm in Michigan, a family is growing a special type of soybean that helps them save a lot of money. These soybeans are part of a project with Michigan State University. When the cows eat these soybeans, their milk gets better with more fat and protein. This makes the milk more valuable. The farm also spends less money on buying extra food for the cows. The soybeans are called high-oleic soybeans, and they have a healthy fat. The farm roasted the soybeans to make them even better. This discovery is exciting because it helps dairy farms be more successful and save thousands of dollars each month.

a place where cows are kept to produce milk
the creamy part in milk that makes it rich
a nutrient in food that helps build muscles
to spend less and keep more cash
cooked with heat to make food tastier or better

questions.question: What is the special crop grown on the Preston family farm?
Who helped the farm with the soybean project?
What improved in the cows' milk after eating the soybeans?
How did the soybeans help the farm save money?
What is the name of the special soybeans used?
What did the farm do to the soybeans to make them better for the cows?

background_read: Dairy farming is when people raise cows to get milk. Milk has fat and protein that make it healthy. Farmers often buy extra food called supplements to feed their cows, which can be expensive. Soybeans are plants that can be used as food for animals. High-oleic soybeans have a special type of fat that is good for cows. Roasting is a way to cook food to improve it. This story shows how new ideas from science can help farmers save money and produce better milk.
Article_Structure: WHO: The Preston family dairy farm and Michigan State University researchers
WHAT: Growing special high-oleic soybeans to improve cow milk and save money on feed
WHERE: On a farm in southern Michigan
WHY: To make dairy farming more profitable and produce higher quality milk

perspectives.description: The Preston family is happy because the soybeans save them money and improve their milk, making their farm more successful.
